alert.note: Alert for Lunenburg; Mecklenburg (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 11:39AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...An area of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Mecklenburg and southeastern Lunenburg Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1138 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Buffalo Springs, or 8 miles northeast of Virgilina, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, and rainfall of 1 to 2 inches. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... South Hill, Chase City, Clarksville, La Crosse, Boydton, Buffalo Springs, Nelson, Bacons Fork, Spanish Grove, Beechwood, Finchley, Fairview, Rogers Corner, Bracey, Eppes Fork, John H Kerr Reservoir, Baskerville, Wightman, Palmer Springs and John H Kerr Dam. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
